xwikidoc.creator: xwiki:XWiki.Admin
xwikidoc.author: xwiki:XWiki.Admin
xwikidoc.content: ### Home page platform.appwithinminutes.homePageTitle=App Within Minutes platform.appwithinminutes.description=XWikiの強力な構造化データ管理システムをもとに、コラボレーション用のウェブアプリケーションを数分で作成しましょう。 platform.appwithinminutes.createAppButtonLabel=アプリケーションを作成 platform.appwithinminutes.appsLiveTableHeading=アプリケーション platform.appwithinminutes.appsLiveTable.doc.title=アプリケーション ### Missing: platform.appwithinminutes.appsLiveTable.doc.author=Last author platform.appwithinminutes.appsLiveTable.doc.date=アップデートの日付 platform.appwithinminutes.appsLiveTable._actions=アクション platform.appwithinminutes.grantSpaceAdminRightsSaveComment=スペースの管理権限を与える。 ### AWM Applications panel entry platform.appwithinminutes.appPanelCreateEntry=あなたのアプリケーションを作りましょう！ ### Wizard step ### Missing: platform.appwithinminutes.wizardStepHeading=Step {0} \u2014 {1} appWithinMinutes.wizardStep.name.name=名称 ### Missing: appWithinMinutes.wizardStep.name.title=Name your application appWithinMinutes.wizardStep.name.description=アプリケーションの名称を選択してください appWithinMinutes.wizardStep.structure.name=構造 appWithinMinutes.wizardStep.structure.title=データを構造化 ### Missing: appWithinMinutes.wizardStep.structure.description=Describe the application data appWithinMinutes.wizardStep.entries.name=エントリー ### Missing: appWithinMinutes.wizardStep.entries.title=Locate your data appWithinMinutes.wizardStep.entries.description=データの保存場所を選択 appWithinMinutes.wizardStep.presentation.name=プレゼンテーション ### Missing: appWithinMinutes.wizardStep.presentation.title=Customize your application home page ### Missing: appWithinMinutes.wizardStep.presentation.description=Customize the application home page platform.appwithinminutes.wizardStepNextButtonLabel=次のステップ platform.appwithinminutes.wizardStepNextButtonTip=次のステップに行く platform.appwithinminutes.wizardStepFinishButtonLabel=完了 platform.appwithinminutes.wizardStepFinishButtonTip=アプリケーションのトップページに行く ### Missing: platform.appwithinminutes.wizardStepPreviousButtonLabel=Previous Step ### Missing: platform.appwithinminutes.wizardStepPreviousButtonTip=Go to previous step platform.appwithinminutes.wizardStepHelpTitle=ステップ ### Missing: platform.appwithinminutes.wizardStepHelpDescription=This wizard will guide you through the process of creating an application. These are the steps you'll take: ### Wizard Step 1: Application Name ### Missing: appWithinMinutes.createApp.location.label=Location ### Missing: appWithinMinutes.createApp.location.hint=The location in the page hierarchy where the application will be created. ### Missing: appWithinMinutes.createApp.parent.label=Parent ### Missing: appWithinMinutes.createApp.parent.hint=The parent of the new application. Leave this field empty if you want to create a top level application. ### Missing: appWithinMinutes.createApp.parent.placeholder=Path.To.Parent appWithinMinutes.codeSpace.title=コード ### Missing: appWithinMinutes.codeSpace.description=This is the place where the application code is located. ### Missing: appWithinMinutes.codeSpace.hiddenPagesInfo=The hidden pages are also listed, even though your current user profile settings prevent to do so, otherwise none of the application code pages would be visible because they are all hidden by default. platform.appwithinminutes.appNamePageTitle=アプリケーションを作成 platform.appwithinminutes.appNameLabel=アプリケーション名 platform.appwithinminutes.appNameHint=アプリケーション名はトップページのURLと、アプリケーションのコードを保存する場所を決定します。 platform.appwithinminutes.appNamePreviewHomePageUrlLabel=アプリケーションのトップページのURL platform.appwithinminutes.appNamePreviewCodeSpaceLabel=アプリケーションのコードの場所 platform.appwithinminutes.appNameIsUsedWarning=このアプリケーションは既に存在します。次のステップに進むと、既存のアプリケーションを編集します。 platform.appwithinminutes.appNameEmptyError=アプリケーション名を入力してください。 ### Wizard Step 2: Application Structure ### Missing: platform.appwithinminutes.classEditorPaletteTitle=Field Palette ### Missing: platform.appwithinminutes.classEditorPaletteHint=Drag & drop fields from the palette to create the form that will be used to input your data. ### Missing: platform.appwithinminutes.classEditorCanvasHint=Drag fields from the palette and drop them in this area. platform.appwithinminutes.classEditorUpdateTemplateLabel=テンプレートをアップデート platform.appwithinminutes.classEditorUpdateTemplateHint=テンプレート（{0}）は既定のフィールドの値を保存します。 platform.appwithinminutes.classEditorUpdateSheetLabel=シートをアップデート platform.appwithinminutes.classEditorUpdateSheetHint=シート（{0}）は構造化データを表示して編集するために使用されます。 platform.appwithinminutes.classEditorUpdateTranslationsLabel=翻訳をアップデート ### Missing: platform.appwithinminutes.classEditorUpdateTranslationsHint=Update the translation of field pretty names and list values ({0}). ### Missing: platform.appwithinminutes.classEditorMultipleSheetsWarning=This class has multiple sheets. ### Missing: platform.appwithinminutes.classEditorDuplicateFieldNameError=The class has two fields with the same name: {0} platform.appwithinminutes.classEditorTemplateSaveComment=既定の値をアップデート ### Missing: platform.appwithinminutes.classEditorBindSheetSaveComment=Bind class sheet platform.appwithinminutes.classEditorSheetSaveComment=クラスシートをアップデート platform.appwithinminutes.classEditorTranslationsSaveComment=翻訳をアップデート platform.appwithinminutes.classEditorDatePickerSelectCurrentTime=今 platform.appwithinminutes.classEditorDatePickerSelectCurrentDate=今日 ### Static List Editor platform.appwithinminutes.classEditorStaticListEditorAddItemLabel=追加 platform.appwithinminutes.classEditorStaticListEditorDeleteItemLabel=削除 appWithinMinutes.templateProviderEditor.hint=アプリケーションのエントリーは、構造化データを含むウィキのページです。 ### Missing: appWithinMinutes.templateProviderEditor.icon.hint=The icon associated with an application entry. ### Missing: appWithinMinutes.templateProviderEditor.description.hint=Short description of an application entry. ### Missing: appWithinMinutes.templateProviderEditor.visibilityRestrictions.name=Where to create the entries from ### Missing: appWithinMinutes.templateProviderEditor.visibilityRestrictions.hint=If no location is selected, the entries can be created from any page. ### Missing: appWithinMinutes.templateProviderEditor.creationRestrictions.name=Where to create the entries ### Missing: appWithinMinutes.templateProviderEditor.creationRestrictions.hint=If no location is selected, the entries can be created anywhere in the wiki. ### Missing: appWithinMinutes.templateProviderEditor.creationRestrictionsAreSuggestions.name=Don't enforce entry location ### Missing: appWithinMinutes.templateProviderEditor.creationRestrictionsAreSuggestions.hint=Use the locations specified above only as suggestions, allowing the user to select a different location when creating an application entry. ### Missing: appWithinMinutes.templateProviderEditor.terminal.hint=Whether the application entries should be terminal pages or not. ### Wizard Step 3: Application Presentation platform.appwithinminutes.liveTableEditorClassFieldColumnGroupLabel=アプリケーションのフィールド ### Missing: platform.appwithinminutes.liveTableEditorGenericColumnGroupLabel=Generic columns platform.appwithinminutes.liveTableEditorHelpTitle=ヒント ### Missing: platform.appwithinminutes.liveTableEditorHelpDescription=Generic live table columns are independent of your application structure. They provide information about the pages that hold your application data. platform.appwithinminutes.liveTableEditorDocTitleColumnName=ページのタイトル platform.appwithinminutes.liveTableEditorDocTitleColumnDescription=アプリケーションのデータを含むページのタイトル platform.appwithinminutes.liveTableEditorDocNameColumnName=ページ名 platform.appwithinminutes.liveTableEditorDocNameColumnDescription=アプリケーションのデータを含むページの名称 platform.appwithinminutes.liveTableEditorDocLocationColumnName=場所 platform.appwithinminutes.liveTableEditorDocLocationColumnDescription=アプリケーションのデータを含むページの場所 ### Missing: platform.appwithinminutes.liveTableEditorDocAuthorColumnName=Last Author platform.appwithinminutes.liveTableEditorDocAuthorColumnDescription=アプリケーションのデータを最後に編集したユーザー ### Missing: platform.appwithinminutes.liveTableEditorDocCreatorColumnName=Creator platform.appwithinminutes.liveTableEditorDocCreatorColumnDescription=アプリケーションのデータを作成したユーザー platform.appwithinminutes.liveTableEditorDocDateColumnName=日付 platform.appwithinminutes.liveTableEditorDocDateColumnDescription=アプリケーションのデータを最後に編集した日付 platform.appwithinminutes.liveTableEditorDocCreationDateColumnName=作成日 platform.appwithinminutes.liveTableEditorDocCreationDateColumnDescription=アプリケーションのデータを作成した日付 platform.appwithinminutes.liveTableEditorActionsColumnName=アクション platform.appwithinminutes.liveTableEditorActionsColumnDescription=アプリケーションのデータについて実行できるアクション（編集や削除など）のリスト platform.appwithinminutes.liveTableEditorAttachmentsColumnName=添付ファイル ### Missing: platform.appwithinminutes.liveTableEditorAttachmentsColumnDescription=A special column to display links to the attachments of a data page platform.appwithinminutes.liveTableEditorImagesColumnName=画像 ### Missing: platform.appwithinminutes.liveTableEditorImagesColumnDescription=A special column to display the images attached to a data page platform.appwithinminutes.liveTableEditorAvatarColumnName=アバター ### Missing: platform.appwithinminutes.liveTableEditorAvatarColumnDescription=A special column to display the user avatar. Works only for a table bound to the XWiki.XWikiUsers class ### Missing: platform.appwithinminutes.liveTableEditorTitleHint=The application title to be displayed on the application home page, on the applications panel and live table, on the breadcrumb, etc. ### Missing: platform.appwithinminutes.liveTableEditorDescriptionHint=The content to be displayed on the homepage above the live table with the application data. Use it to describe the application. ### Missing: platform.appwithinminutes.liveTableEditorColumnsHint=Select the columns you would like to include in the live table displayed on the application home page. ### Missing: platform.appwithinminutes.liveTableEditorSaveComment=Update LiveTable platform.appwithinminutes.liveTableEditorMoveColumnHint=ドラッグアンドドロップで順番を変更 platform.appwithinminutes.liveTableEditorDeleteColumnHint=削除 ### Missing: platform.appwithinminutes.liveTableEditorAddColumnHint=Add selected column ### Missing: platform.appwithinminutes.liveTableEditorDeprecatedColumnsWarning=Some columns are deprecated, probably because the corresponding application fields have been deleted. Do you want to remove them? Yes / No ### Missing: platform.appwithinminutes.liveTableEditorIcon=Icon ### Missing: platform.appwithinminutes.liveTableEditorIconHintWithPicker=The application icon. You can select an icon from the icon picker or you can reference an attached image. ### Wizard Step 4: Application home page platform.appwithinminutes.appLiveTableHeading=エントリー platform.appwithinminutes.appLiveTableEditEntryActionName=編集 platform.appwithinminutes.appLiveTableDeleteEntryActionName=削除 platform.appwithinminutes.appHomePageActionsHeading=アクション platform.appwithinminutes.appHomePageAddEntryLabel=追加 platform.appwithinminutes.appHomePageAddEntryHint=新しいエントリーを追加 platform.appwithinminutes.appHomePageEntryNameLabel=エントリーの名称： platform.appwithinminutes.appHomePageDeleteEntriesLabel=全てのエントリーを削除 platform.appwithinminutes.appHomePageEditAppLabel=アプリケーションを編集 platform.appwithinminutes.appHomePageTranslateAppLabel=アプリケーションを翻訳 platform.appwithinminutes.appHomePageDeleteAppLabel=アプリケーションを削除 ### Missing: platform.appwithinminutes.appHomePageMovedWarning=The application might not function correctly because it has been renamed or moved without updating the code. Please edit the application and follow the steps in order to update the code. AppWithinMinutes.LiveTableClass_description=詳細 ### Missing: AppWithinMinutes.LiveTableClass_columns=Live Table Columns ### Delete application dialog ### Missing: platform.appwithinminutes.deleteAppConfirmation=The application {0} and ALL its entries will be deleted. Are you sure you want to continue? platform.appwithinminutes.deleteAppEntriesConfirmation=アプリケーション {0} の全エントリーを削除します。続行してよろしいですか？ platform.appwithinminutes.deleteAppDoesNotExistError=指定したアプリケーションは存在しません。 ### Missing: platform.appwithinminutes.deleteAppInvalidAppError=The specified name is not a valid App Within Minutes application. ### Missing: platform.appwithinminutes.deleteAppNotSpecifiedError=No application name was specified. ### Rename Application ### Missing: appWithinMinutes.renameApp.label=Rename Application appWithinMinutes.renameApp.close=閉じる ### Missing: appWithinMinutes.renameApp.changeAppTitleInfo=You can change the application title without renaming the application just by editing the application home page. ### Missing: appWithinMinutes.renameApp.regenerateAppCodeWarning=The application code is going to be regenerated if you rename the application. Code customizations will be overwritten as a consequence. appWithinMinutes.renameApp.newName.label=新しい名称 appWithinMinutes.renameApp.pageExistsError=この名称のページは指定した場所に既に存在します。 appWithinMinutes.renameApp.locationForbiddenError=アプリケーションを選択した場所に移動することは許可されていません。 appWithinMinutes.renameApp.location.label=新しい場所 ### Missing: appWithinMinutes.renameApp.location.hint=The location in the page hierarchy where to move the application. ### Missing: appWithinMinutes.renameApp.parent.label=New Parent ### Missing: appWithinMinutes.renameApp.parent.hint=The new parent page. Leave this field empty if you want to move the application to the top of the page hierarchy. ### Missing: appWithinMinutes.renameApp.inProgress=Renaming application... ### Missing:
